titles.title: Employee Educational Assistance Act of 1999
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the exclusion for employer-provided educational assistance.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/4/1999--Introduced. Employee Educational Assistance Act of 1999 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permanently extend the exclusion from gross income of employer-provided educational assistance.
